text: Saint-Nicolas or Saint-Nicolas-lez-Arras is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== Saint- Nicolas is a large suburb of Arras, on the banks of the Scarpe river, just north of the centre of Arras, at the junction of the D41, D63 and N17 roads.
